author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Changed mime string decoding to be more robust by trying to work around
#- Kinda ugly... but I don't know of a better way.

author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Added tests to retrieve and set single data in datasets
- Implemented datasets as far as tested

author: rb:ez.no
msg: # Fixed problems with the delimter as Derick pointed out.
- The modulo part of the delimiter is now optional.
- The delimiter does not appear after the last iteration.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: # Fixed the bugs, pointed out by Derick.
- Fixed a bug that arrays and properties could not be send as expression
part of the include construct. E.g. {include "abc.ezt" send $a[0] as $b}
- Fixed a bug that property fetches were ignored after the first fetch.
- Fixed a bug that the variable is declared in the 'as' part of the include.

author: fh:ez.no
msg: - added the function keepConnection() in the smtp transport. This allows keeping
the connection when sending several mail.
